page.title: 01INTRODUCTION
page.content: On the following pages of the{Domesday {Project}there is information on the villages around us which consists of {Norley,Manley,Kingsley,Hatchmere}and {Delamere.}Each one is a village with rural surroundings.With being a country area it is a very quiet and pleasant place, which attracts people to visit and live roundabout.Some people come from many places to visit {Delamere Forest}and{Hatchmere Lake both are very popular in Summer. Autumn is one of the busiest times of the year in our area for many crops are gathered in including the Cheshire potato.
